@description.name: @description
@description.body: The Scroller wraps a {@link Pane} and provides scroll bars to interactively scroll the pane's content.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: rowCount {Integer?0} The number of rows of the virtual grid.
@param.description: The number of rows of the virtual grid.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: columnCount {Integer?0} The number of columns of the virtual grid.
@param.description: The number of columns of the virtual grid.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the scroller's virtual pane.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
id {String} ID of the child control. If a # is used, the id is
   the part in front of the #.
@param.description:
ID of the child control. If a # is used, the id is
   the part in front of the #.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
hash {String?undefined} If a child control name contains a #,
   all text following the # will be the hash argument.
@param.description:
If a child control name contains a #,
   all text following the # will be the hash argument.
